mapper.select:
select sst.userNo, sst.targetType, sst.mm01, sst.mm02, sst.mm03, sst.mm04, sst.mm05, sst.mm06, sst.mm07, sst.mm08, sst.mm09, sst.mm10, sst.mm11, sst.mm12 from swc_sales_target sst where sst.compNo = #{compNo} and sst.targetYear = #{targetYear} and sst.targetType = #{targetType} and userNo IN
#{item.userNo}
